citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, records of acquisition and the environmental enhancement program for birds were not available
for review by the inspector. Review of records required by the Animal Welfare Act facilitates the inspection process by
allowing the inspector to determine compliance and evaluate animal welfare. The facility shall ensure that the records
required to be kept by the Animal Welfare Act and the regulations are complete and available for USDA APHIS officials to
examine. Correction date: July 1, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the store manager.
n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
At the time of inspection, records of acquisition and the environmental enhancement program for birds were not available 
for review by the inspector. Review of records required by the Animal Welfare Act facilitates the inspection process by 
allowing the inspector to determine compliance and evaluate animal welfare. The facility shall ensure that the records 
required to be kept by the Animal Welfare Act and the regulations are complete and available for USDA APHIS officials to 
examine. Correction date: July 1, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the store manager. 
 
 n

species.common: CONGO AFRICAN GREY PARROT / GRAY PARROT
